document_title: Vaginal (private area) dryness: Causes, symptoms and diagnosis
subsection_content:
In fact, women can prevent and control vaginal moisture well by:
Drink a lot of water.; Clean private areas regularly and properly.; Do not use products that cause vaginal irritation; Do not use vaginal lubricants or moisturizers without a doctor's prescription to avoid adverse effects.; Have sex with enough quality foreplay to increase vaginal secretions, making lovemaking smoother and easier to reach orgasm.; Do not use condoms containing nonoyxnol-9 or N-9 because these are chemicals that can cause vaginal dryness.; See your doctor immediately when you have symptoms of vaginal dryness to get instructions from your doctor on how to intervene promptly and effectively.; Fully follow your doctor's instructions, do not arbitrarily use medication or stop prescription medications.; Follow up on schedule to have your health status monitored by a doctor.
Hopefully the above information has helped women better understand vaginal dryness so that they can go see a doctor and receive specific treatment instructions from the doctor. If you have any questions or concerns, you can contact the Tam Anh General Hospital System hotline for support from good Obstetrics and Gynecology experts!
